Maravillosa obra de arte, destaco sobre todo su entrañable comunidad. Grandes graficos, optimizacion y jugabilidad, y muy buen laucher, bendiciones a todos, hasta luego.
I have over 1000 hours on console, its my first time on pc. This game has mixed emotions for me lmao. you will get your ass kicked plenty so don't blame me for buying this game.

Honestly while I'm not a fan of horror pretty much at all, you get used to this game real quick. Most matches are engaging, and it's a really fun time to play with four other friends in custom matches.

Só o'que eu tenho a dizer é que esse jogo é maravilhoso!!
Obviamente todos devem conhecer essa maravilha.
Conseguiria citar muitos motivos pelos quais todos deveriam jogar, mas prefiro deixar que experienciem.
Otimo para jogar em grupo e manter a amizade forte e unida.
Raramente vocês verão jogo mais cooperativo e divertido que esse!!
Realmente uma obra prima da idade moderna, sem defeitos.
Ouso dizer que ninguém nunca vai conseguir fazer um jogo no estilo que seja melhor!

サバイバー　キラーどちらも楽しいですｂ
◎サバイバーは味方とのコミュニケーションやキラーから逃げるチェイスなどが楽しいです。
ソロでも中々楽しめますｂ　最大4人まで組めるパーティーだともっとゲームを楽しめます！

〇キラー　いい立ち回りができて4人全滅出来たら神ゲーになります。
全逃げされたり　煽られたら悲しい気持ちになります。
ゲームバランスはキラーが不利だと思っています。　VC4人パーティーで同じぐらいの技量だとほとんど勝てないと思います。

日本のキラーの人口がかなり少ないようなので、増えてくれたら嬉しいです。

○コントローラーの方でキラーやられる方はかなり難しいと思いますが　キラーだけマウスキーボードの両刀もいいかもしれません。

○最初にゲーム内課金して必須パークを取ると快適にプレイできます。
好きなサバイバー　キラー　パークなどを見つけていくのも結構楽しいですｂ

The game is made for assassins to win most of the matches, unless they stay afk for the entire match, then everyone can run away.
It's not a balanced game for the survivors.
Quanto mais aprendo a jogar, mais vicio...

Идея - классная. Технически реализовано - не плохо. Баланса - относительно нормальный и меняется с патчами. Но есть одно НО. Количество читеров > честные игроки. В каждой второй игре вам будет попадаться читер, с абсолютно разными видами софтов. Ужасное отношение к игрокам. Вместо античита, пилим скинчики и новых персонажей, умнички. Надеюсь онлайн упадёт у игры до 1к
La dinamica del juego es muy unica. A medida que uno se va metiendo mas de lleno en el juego va encontrando cosas que no gustan mucho, pero siempre dan ganas de volver a jugar.
me parece una mierda de juego, sobretodo por la comunidad que tiene y el tipo de personas que lo juegan en su mayoría. porfavor si lees esto no lo juegues .

The games a piece of shit. Matchmaking is a joke. Its a roll of dice whether you get people at your level, people so bad they got the game yesterday and have no clue what they're doing or a bunch of 8000 hour tryhards 4 stacked up, or a killer who has a busted build that you really can't do anything against and has the 5000 hours of playing to actually use that build.

I've come back time and time again trying to give it a chance but honestly I feel like I wasted the 164 hours I've played on the game.

To get anything in this game you need to level up characters, which is fine except each character needs about 1.4-1.6 million till you unlock the perks to give to other killers or survivors. In a perfect game using BnC and a boosting offering you can get ~100k. That sounds great, just 14 matches per killer and survivor and you get everything in the game as long as you play perfectly? Well no, the survivors also need to play decently well for you to get this number as well as conversely the killer if you're playing survivor, and you need special offering to appear in your bloodweb which will be a greater drain so 64k max is a lot more realistic, but so what that's just 20 matches? Not too bad, until you consider there's like 26 killers and 30 survivors or something like that. So that's just 56 characters x 20 matches or over 1000 matches. But that's fine since you now have everything unlocked and can play the builds you want that are interesting and fun right?

....right?

No you can't because now you need to go and unlock those perks for the killer you want to play...and then level those perks to their max level...oh and all of this is randomized so maybe you get the 4 perks for your build and level them in 12 blood webs or maybe you need to go through the max number of 78 blood webs for killer or 90 for survivor. But surely its not that bad right? I mean its only the level 50 blood web which can take 40-80k BP to go through depending on how lucky you get...Maybe you're smart and you only leveled to 40 for each character so you get a slight discount on. You have to play 1500 matches before you even get to have access to all the perks. Oh and the game isn't free, has exclusive paid DLC that you need to wait for the perk rotation to get those perks and have the shards to pay for it or pay the company money so that you can access that part of the game. Its the grind of a mobile game, on a paid retail game with paid DLC. 

My verdict if you're considering buying this game, Only do it if you have 4 other friends who can play custom games with you which actually let you make builds and play the game. If you're looking to buy this game from online multiplayer or solo queuing then don't. It may be the only game of this type but its not worth your time or effort. It took me 164 hours to realize it ain't worth it, don't let that happen to you.

Que pésimo juego, como es posible que la versión de móviles sea más amigable, justa y mejor hecha que la de PC, además no es posible vincular ambas, en fin el peor emparejamiento que he visto en toda mi vida, ni siendo nuevo te salvas de que te toque jugar contra los toxicos del juego, todas mis partidas eran lo mismo, sin importar que jugara, como asesino todos los supervivientes eran de mayor nivel en todos los sentidos, con todas sus habilidades desbloqueadas y en color ver o morado, apenas si podía matar al único nuevo de la partida y eso, como superviviente al contrario, mi primera partida fue alguien que ya tenia la cerda, habitualmente fui el primero en morir, todos los asesinos que me toco eran de mayor nivel y vale no siempre se puede ganar, pero es que de tosas mis partidas solo gane dos, una con alguien que fue amigable y otra porque se desconecto, pero del resto siempre era derrota tras derrota, osea es que ni siquiera podía progresar un poco porque ni podía hacer algo en la partida, en pocas palabras su modo de emparejamiento por habilidad es un asco, una mierda, una vergüenza.

Muchos diran que importa, que uno se aguanta y que luego aprende y se vuelve mejor, pero como esperan que mejore, si literalmente no se puede hacer nada en la partida sin que ya te estén colgando por segunda vez o que todos los supervivientes logren escapar intactos a pesar de que los perseguías y perseguías, por algo la comunidad de este juego es más toxica que todo el mercurio de un termómetro, no se que es tuneliar pero estoy casi seguro que me lo hicieron un montón de veces en mis pocas partidas.

En definitiva un pésimo que juego que no da oportunidades, que a pesar de los tutoriales no son malos no te preparan realmente para lo que es una partida real, que literalmente empiezas desde 0 sin poder obtener nuevos personajes hasta dedicarle un montón de horas, que a mi parecer una compañía a la que solo les importa vender skins y nuevos personajes con DLC, no te digo que no lo compres, pero en definitiva si lo vas a hacer sera mejor que tengas amigos expertos en este juego o de lo contrario la vas a pasar muy mal intentando disfrutar del juego siendo nuevo y tu solo, realmente si hubera podido antes de las dos horas ya hubiera pedido el reembolso, que asco de juego de verdad, esta mejor su versión móvil.
Latest patch totally ruined the game, killers are all face camping and tunneling survivors
Es divertido pero hay mucha toxicidad

Yeah honestly, have to say I have enjoyed this game since I first played it on a free weekend, years back just after release.

I consider my a horror fan, and am familiar with pretty much every licensed franchise in Dead by Daylight. I really appreciate the seemingly-still expanding mix of licensed horror icons. They're not even a necessity to buy unless your aim is to use that specific killer/survivor, but you can still play the maps for DLC content when playing with a player who owns that content. So I find that nice. You can choose to buy the DLC if it interests you, if not Michael Myers or the Nemesis may still yet be hot on your tail.

As far as gameplay, there isnt much I can say that others haven't. If you're a fan of survival horror games, horror films, or just enjoy feeling tense moments along side the grip of fear when being chased, I'd say pick this up on sale. You can easily play 3-4 rounds without feeling bored nor overly-stimulated, come back in an evening, and pick up where you left off. It's relatively mindless fun that does require alertness.

Edit:

>want to kill time
>bright idea
>Dead by Daylight
>try to play
>2/5 players afk
>quit match
>4:00 lockout
cant play survivor bc u just get tunneled

[h1] Spiel als Survivor: [/h1]
Sollte man eine etwas devote Ader haben und es genießen, wenn eine Person (evtl. auch mehrere Mitspieler), darüber entscheiden ob du Spielst, wie du Spielst und wie lange du eine Runde mitspielst, dann lege ich dir das Spiel ans Herzen. Natürlich könnte es mit den richtigen Teammates Spaß machen, aber sind wir mal ehrlich:

[h1] Spiel einfach als Killer! [/h1]

1. Du hattest einen Reudigen Tag auf der Arbeit? Lass es an den erst besten Survivor raus der dir entgegen kommt.
2. Du magst es Geflamed zu werden? Du bist hier Goldrichtig, denn du wirst in jeden aftergame chat aufs übelste nieder gemacht, weil du den bösen Killer ausgewählt hast. 
3. Du siehst gerne Sportsendungen? Perfekt hier darfst du Survivorn an einen sicherer Ausgangsposition beim Hardcore Kniebeuge Training zuschauen. 

Also ja ich würde das Spiel einen Menschen empfehlen, aber nur wenn man Harte nerven mit dabei hat.
무서워서 하기 싫음 발전기 터지면 내 멘탈도 터짐 누가 하자고 하면 하는데 하기 싫음(?)

I won't recommend this game to anyone until they remove MMR.  It makes it way too unfun to play when you have to try your ass off in every game.  

Remove MMR.  Don't "rework" it.  Don't try to save your little pet project because you spent months working on a feature made for competitive games when you've made one of the most unbalanced games there is on the market anyway.  DBD's strength was that your matches were always a mixed bag so you could mess around with builds and still have fun.

Remove MMR.

Dead by Daylight is a game that is just a really frustrating game to play. It has had it's flaws since it launched, and while it has gotten better since then, it's still not what it should  be. The thing is, there are these issues still present that the community has been asking them to fix since it launched. Playing killer is overall just overall frustrating to play, so a lot of people who play that role will use tactics that aren't fun to play against. Like camping or tunneling. So that makes the survivor role frustrating to play. It happens more than it should. The match making system has been complained about a lot since the release of the very flawed MMR system. There was flaws with the old system  as well, but the MMR system is worse. The devs don't listen to community feedback, and they have gone on record to say that they have no plans on changing. I have played a lot of hours in DbD, but the hours I have spent playing using steam arent the only hours i have spent with the game. I used to play it on Xbox One before i had a PC and I have over 1000 hours there. I think my biggest issue with DbD is that i have so much play time. I remember the frustration I felt when I played with 100 hours. It just keeps adding up, and it gets more and more frustrating to play. It's not because I'm bad. I know that some of the funnest matches I've had were some of the most challenging matches I've had. It's a really fun game when it feels competitive, and the devs won't make changes that will allow it to be more of that. So it continues to be more frustrating to play than it is actually fun to play. I have obviously enjoyed DbD, but I do not think I want to play it anymore unless something changes, because I don't have fun in so many of my matches. I hope something changes that will allow it to be a better experience for its players and loyal community. It has so much potential and its sad that the devs won;t do anything to make it better.
